name: FilmHub â€“ Premium Film Streaming Platform
description:
FilmHub is a modern, full-featured film streaming platform built with Laravel and Tailwind CSS. Designed for entrepreneurs, agencies, and developers, FilmHub lets you launch your own Netflix-style streaming service in minutes. It includes user authentication, role-based access (admin, author, user), film management (CRUD), secure video streaming, ratings, comments, achievements, and a beautiful, responsive UI.
With enterprise-grade security, commercial licensing, and easy customization, FilmHub is perfect for anyone looking to monetize video content or build a scalable entertainment business.

repository.name: filmhub-commercial
repository.description: Private repository for FilmHub streaming platform source code
